headline: Is Rollins' (ROL) Acquisition Surge and Tech Focus Shifting Its Investment Narrative?
summary: Rollins recently reported strong second-quarter results, with revenues reaching US$1 billion, an increase of 12.1% year over year, driven by 7.3% organic growth and operational technology improvements across its business. An interesting highlight is the company's rapid expansion through 44 acquisitions in 2024 alone, which has significantly increased its global footprint and propelled revenue growth. We'll explore how Rollins' aggressive acquisition pace and focus on technology-driven...
